Class SimpleTreeNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.tree.SimpleTreeNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TreeNode
    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public class SimpleTreeNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements TreeNode
    Simple implementation of {@link TreeNode}
